summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of an entity named Richard Phillips. The documents primarily discuss U.S. government efforts to combat Castro-Communist subversion in Latin America, control travel to and from Cuba, and address activities related to Cuban exiles and potential assassination plots. One document mentions Mitchell Livingston WerBell III and his connections to Cuban exiles and the Friends of Abaco group. Since Richard Phillips is not mentioned, no further information can be provided.
significance: Richard Phillips is not mentioned in the provided documents, therefore there is no significance in the JFK context.
